messages.subject: Dai-bosatsu Toge (pics)
messages.msgSnippet: Go to Files find the folder Dai-bosatsu Toge known to us via the film, SWORD OF DOOM, and the more high profile film portraying the Shinsengumi check out the
messages.messageBody:
Go to Files find the folder "Dai-bosatsu Toge"
known to us via the film, SWORD OF DOOM, and the more high profile
film portraying the Shinsengumi
check out the scans (from the BOOK) of Ryunosuke vs thief...these
are rare images....my copy is from 1929 and its falling apart...

Dai-bosatsu Toge is a really famous novel and the story is not just
about a psychopathic swordsman...but about morality (^_^)

I also scanned the photo of the mountain pass where the story
began...
